00039 #include <stdexcept>
00040 #include <string>
00041 
00042 namespace PACC { 
00043     
00044     using namespace std;
00045     
00046     namespace Socket {
00047         
00053         enum Error {
00054             eAddressInUse, 
00055             eAddressNotAvailable, 
00056             eBadDescriptor, 
00057             eBadMessage, 
00058             eConnectionClosed, 
00059             eConnectionRefused, 
00060             eDatagramTooLong, 
00061             eInvalidOption, 
00062             eIsConnected, 
00063             eNotConnected, 
00064             eOpNotSupported, 
00065             ePrivilegedPort, 
00066             eTimeOut, 
00067             eOtherError 
00068         };
00069         
00077         class Exception : public runtime_error {
00078          public:
00080             explicit Exception(int inCode, const string& inMessage)
00081             : runtime_error(inMessage), mNativeCode(inCode) {mCode = convertNativeError(inCode);}
00082             
00084             explicit Exception(Error inCode, const string& inMessage)
00085             : runtime_error(inMessage), mCode(inCode) {mNativeCode = 0;}
00086             
00087             static Error convertNativeError(int inError);
00088             
00090             int getErrorCode(void) const {return mCode;}
00091 
00093             string getMessage(void) const throw();
00094 
00095          protected:
00096             Error mCode; 
00097             int mNativeCode; 
00098             
00099         };
00100         
00101     } // end of Socket namespace
00102     
00103 } // end of PACC namespace
